com.st.st25sdk.command

Class PicopassCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.command.PicopassCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PicopassCommandInterface

    public class PicopassCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements PicopassCommandInterface
    Defines methods to build PICOPASS commands

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PicopassCommand.picopassRfMode
      Lists all possible PICOPASS RF modes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      ACT command as defined in PICOPASS specification Anti collision command
      void actall()
      ACTALL command as defined in PICOPASS specification Anti collision command
      byte[] check(byte[] challenge, byte[] readerSignature)
      CHECK instruction as defined in PICOPASS specification
      byte[] detect()
      DETECT command as defined in PICOPASS specification EAS command
      protected byte formatOpcodeByte(byte instruction, boolean isKC)
      Command byte construction : P M1 M0 K INST
      byte getM1M0Bits()
      This function returns the M1 and M0 bits
      PicopassCommand.picopassRfMode getPicopassRfMode()
      This function send back PicopassRfFrameMode (M1 and M0 bits)
      void halt()
      HALT command as defined in PICOPASS specification Anti collision command
      byte[] identify()
      IDENTIFY command as defined in PICOPASS specification Anti collision command
      byte[] pagesel(byte bookPage)
      PAGESEL command as defined in PICOPASS specification Application command
      byte[] read(byte address)
      READ instruction to read one block as defined in PICOPASS specification Application command
      byte[] read4(byte address)
      READ 4 Blocks instruction to read four blocks as defined in PICOPASS specification Application command
      byte[] readCheck(byte address, boolean isKc)
      REACHECK instruction as defined in PICOPASS specification Security command
      byte[] select(byte[] aSNBorSN)
      SELECT command as defined in PICOPASS specification Anti collision command
      byte[] selectPicopassTag()
      Send act + actall + identify + select commands to get the 8 bytes UID and select tag
      void setM1M0Bits(byte m1m0Bits)
      This function sets the M1 and M0 bits M1 M0 = 0 0 : ISO15693-2 Manchester code + ISO14443B 106 kbits/s M1 M0 = 0 1 : ISO15693-2 FSK code + ISO14443B 106 kbits/s M1 M0 = 0 0 : ISO15693-2 Manchester code + ISO14443B 423 kbits/s M1 M0 = 1 1 : RFU + RFU
      void setPicopassRfMode(byte m1m0Value)
      This function set PicopassRfFrameMode using M1 and M0 bits
      byte[] update(byte address, byte[] data)
      UPDATE instruction as defined in PICOPASS specification Unsecured command
      byte[] update(byte address, byte[] data, byte[] sign)
      UPDATE instruction as defined in PICOPASS specification Security command

    • Method Detail

      • setPicopassRfMode

        public void setPicopassRfMode(byte m1m0Value)
        This function set PicopassRfFrameMode using M1 and M0 bits
        Parameters:
        m1m0Value - M1 M0 values

      • getPicopassRfMode

        public PicopassCommand.picopassRfMode getPicopassRfMode()
        This function send back PicopassRfFrameMode (M1 and M0 bits)
        Returns:
        PICOPASS RF frame mode

      • setM1M0Bits

        public void setM1M0Bits(byte m1m0Bits)
        This function sets the M1 and M0 bits M1 M0 = 0 0 : ISO15693-2 Manchester code + ISO14443B 106 kbits/s M1 M0 = 0 1 : ISO15693-2 FSK code + ISO14443B 106 kbits/s M1 M0 = 0 0 : ISO15693-2 Manchester code + ISO14443B 423 kbits/s M1 M0 = 1 1 : RFU + RFU
        Parameters:
        m1m0Bits - M1 M0 bits

      • getM1M0Bits

        public byte getM1M0Bits()
        This function returns the M1 and M0 bits
        Returns:
        M1M0 bits

      • formatOpcodeByte

        protected byte formatOpcodeByte(byte instruction,
                                boolean isKC)
        Command byte construction : P M1 M0 K INST
        Parameters:
        instruction - LSB INST byte
        isKC - if true = Credit Key used by ReadCheck instruction (K=1), else Debit Key used by ReadCheck instruction (K=1)
        Returns:
        opcode formatted byte
